程序包 si.model

类 EnemyShip

java.lang.Object
si.model.EnemyShip
所有已实现的接口:
Hittable
public class EnemyShip extends Object implements Hittable
Represents an enemy ship in the Asteroids game. Implements the Hittable interface.

      public static int SHIP_SCALE

  • 构造器详细资料

    • EnemyShip

      public EnemyShip(int x, int y, AlienType type)
      Constructs an EnemyShip with the specified coordinates and type.
      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of the enemy ship.
      y - The y-coordinate of the enemy ship.
      type - The AlienType of the enemy ship.

  • 方法详细资料

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the enemy ship based on its angle and speed. Performs boundary checking and reflects the ship upon collision with the screen edges.

    • isHit

      public boolean isHit(Bullet b)
      Checks if the enemy ship is hit by a bullet. If hit, sets the ship as not alive.
      指定者:
      isHit 在接口中 Hittable
      参数:
      b - The Bullet object to check for a hit.
      返回:
      True if the ship is hit, false otherwise.

    • isCrash

      public boolean isCrash(Player player)
      Checks if the enemy ship crashes into the player's ship. If crashed, sets the ship as not alive.
      参数:
      player - The Player object to check for a crash.
      返回:
      True if the ship crashes into the player's ship, false otherwise.

    • getHitBox

      public Rectangle getHitBox()
      Gets the hitbox of the enemy ship for collision detection.
      指定者:
      getHitBox 在接口中 Hittable
      返回:
      The Rectangle representing the hitbox.

      指定者:

      指定者:

    • fire

      public Bullet fire(int x, int y, int fireAngle)
      Fires a bullet from the enemy ship.
      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of the bullet's starting position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the bullet's starting position.
      fireAngle - The firing angle of the bullet.
      返回:
      The Bullet object if a bullet is fired, null otherwise.
